title: Need some help creating my online store
snippet:
I currently have a Squarespace shop (http://www.inthefolds.com/new-products/), but due to the need to collect and pay VAT for the sale of digital products, I have decided to open a Shopify shop. 

I am planning on using the Shopify "lite" option, so that what customers see is still my Squarespace shop front, but the payment etc. will go through Shopify (as they are better set up for dealing with VAT). Currently my product page has a button that says "Purchase on Etsy" and I would like to change this to the Shopify "Buy now" button. I am looking for someone who can set this up for me and also help me get my Shopify store set up properly so that it is ready to be used (get automatic emails set up for sales etc.)
